divs: Sighting DetailsDriving westbound on Bastenchurry in yorba linda between fairmount and lakeview, I was looking straight ahead and noticed three lights in the sky at, what I assumed was close to, LAX. (Final approach to LAX runs parallel to bastenchurry) I saw 3 lights close together, the first light was stationary, while the other 2 lights next to the first light were streaking straight down...not horizontal like a meteor but straight down. I could not stop the car and watch. So when I got home I checked the news and called my brother-in-law, who is a sheriff, and asked him to check with his station. As of 6:55 he has yet to call me back. I don't think it was a UFO but I thought I just witnessed a mid air colisio't n between to aircraft. I haven't heard anything so maybe it was something else. But it looked very real.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Yorba Linda
There was one other sighting in Yorba Linda on or around January 26th 2008
